lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: What two men were thrown into prison with Joseph?
answers: Pharaoh's baker and wine taster
Two of his brothers
Two soldiers from Pharaoh's army
Two men who tried to steal grain

questions.text: What happened to both men while they were in prison?
answers: They had special dreams from God
They both escaped
They got into a big fight
They became very sick

questions.text: What did Joseph say about dreams?
answers: Only God knows what dreams mean
Dreams are random and don't matter
Anyone can figure out dreams
It's foolish to talk about dreams

questions.text: What did the wine taster dream?
answers: He saw a grapevine with three branches; he squeezed the grapes into Pharaoh's special cup
He saw himself becoming Pharaoh
He saw a giant river of milk
He saw Joseph handing him fruit

questions.text: What did Joseph say the wine taster's dream meant?
answers: In three days, he would get his old job back
Egypt's water would become wine
He would get married
He would stay in prison forever

questions.text: What favor did Joseph ask of the wine taster?
answers: Tell Pharaoh that he didn't deserve to be a slave or in prison
Bring him better food
Help him escape at night
Give him a new coat
He carried three baskets of bread on his head; birds pecked at the baskets
He baked bread for Pharaoh
He was flying over Egypt
He burned all the bread in the palace

questions.text: What did Joseph say the baker's dream meant?
answers: In three days, Pharaoh would kill him; birds would peck at his body
He would become Pharaoh's favorite servant
He would leave prison unharmed
He would have to go on a diet
The baker was killed; the wine taster got his job back
Both men were set free
Both men stayed in prison
The two men switched jobs

questions.text: What did the wine taster do after he got his job back?
answers: He completely forgot about Joseph
He visited Joseph every week
He immediately told Pharaoh about Joseph
He quit his job to move away
